channel.title: Run,
channel.description:
@echo off
java -Xmx800M server
pause
thats my run.bat
any1 have a working one?

item.title: Run,
item.dc:creator: @Robban1 Robban1
item.description:
@Robban1 wrote:

[quote=“vic 08, post:13, topic:236014”][quote author=Robban1 link=topic=311321.msg2486665#msg2486665 date=1223871924]
here Is SOme Codes:
For Compile:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

For Run : @echo off title Name Here runserver "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_10/bin/javac.exe" *.java "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_10/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m server pause

The Runserver(THe Same As Run): @echo off color 0a title Project Czar java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

THat Was All From Me!

//RObban

I Am RObban Only i Idk THe Pass:p
[/quote]

Actually, fyi. Those aren’t from you kay. They are from the people who originally created private servers. You didn’t create any of those so nice try.

Also, Do YoU AlWAys Talk LiKE ThIS? And whose robban…[/quote]
Emm when did i said I MADED IT?!!!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Soul_Reaper1 Soul_Reaper
item.description:
@Soul_Reaper1 wrote:

try

@echo off
color 0a
title Allstar-Scape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

that works for me.
